name: The God of Archery VR
description:
The God of Archery VR

College of Creative Design and Entertainment Technology presented
Virtual Reality Experience, Fun VR Archery for Events and Exhibition in Thailand.

"The God of Archery" is the defining Virtual Reality. archery experience, take bow and arrows in hands to shoot the enemies.

Work on HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and all devices support Microsoft Mixed Reality

How to Reload the new arrow: Press the trigger button from your back.

Which game is recommended to play with green screen.

</strong>
